posts.post_content:
Posted By: Art M.
I am looking for a T206 Bernhard, Nashville.  Will or buy or trade.  Looking for vg condition, prefer raw.
Please send scan and price.  I have some duplicate T206 for trading.
Thanks,
Art M.

Posted By: Scott Levy
Art,

I've got a bernhard which appears to be Ex/Ex+.  However it has a rough cut edge and seems slightly sort suggesting that it might be trimmed.  Anyway, my price will reflect those realities if interested.

Regards,
Scott

Posted By: Art M.
Hello Scott,
Thanks for the reply. I will pass on your T206 Bernhard that may/may not be trimmed.  I do appreciate you responding to my post.
